SupersedingProduct.description: The SupersedingProducts array cannot be null but can be an empty array.

SupersedingProductSku.description:
Maps to the field Products.ProductId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

SupersedingProductName.description:
Maps to the field Products.ProductDescription in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed
